channel.title: org_roam on Sting's Note
channel.description: Recent content in org_roam on Sting's Note

item.title: First post from ox-hugo
item.description: This is the first blog post from ox-hugo. I’m using org-roam now. I’m trying to keep my note in org-roam and use these notes to compose my blog posts. I try to use ox-hugo so that I can keep the source files in org format and keep them in my database. Moreover, I can copy the content from my roam notes.
